mapper.select: select du.user_id, du.user_name, du.user_age, du.user_sex, drl.rl_id, drl.rl_title from ddtp_rl_u_e join ddtp_recruit_list drl on ddtp_rl_u_e.rl_id = drl.rl_id join ddtp_user du on ddtp_rl_u_e.user_id = du.user_id where e_id = #{e_id} and du.user_id not in (select v_user_id from ddtp_u_ra)

select du.user_id, du.user_name, du.user_age, du.user_sex, drl.rl_id, drl.rl_title from ddtp_rl_u_e join ddtp_recruit_list drl on ddtp_rl_u_e.rl_id = drl.rl_id join ddtp_user du on ddtp_rl_u_e.user_id = du.user_id where du.user_id in (select v_user_id from ddtp_u_ra where v_ra_id = #{v_ra_id})
